summary: Email correspondence between legal professionals regarding the SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein, specifically concerning an individual named Rodgers. The email discusses an attorney for a civil case related to Epstein seeking to contact Rodgers's counsel, likely for service of a subpoena or document request. It references a proffer agreement signed that day.

persons.name: Brendan Quigley
persons.context: Recipient of the email, appears to be legal counsel for or in contact with Mr. Rodgers in connection with the SDNY Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Rodgers
persons.context: Subject of the email; an individual interviewed in connection with the SDNY Epstein investigation, whose current counsel is being sought by an attorney involved in a civil case related to Epstein.

connections.description: The email indicates Brendan Quigley has been in touch with the sender in connection with their interview of Mr. Rodgers, suggesting a legal or representational connection.

events.title: Proffer agreement signed
events.description: A proffer agreement was signed, as referenced in the email attachment note.

keyFacts: An attorney for an active civil case connected to Jeffrey Epstein is seeking to contact the current counsel for an individual named Rodgers, likely to serve a subpoena or request for documents/testimony.
The sender of the email had previously interviewed Mr. Rodgers in connection with the SDNY investigation into Epstein.
A proffer agreement involving Rodgers was signed on the date of this email correspondence (June 5, 2020).
